Description.Text: Hotel Airone is a classic 3-star superior property offering cosy accommodation in the heart of Naples. Highlights include a roof garden, free Wi-Fi and a good location close to Universita metro station. The historic centre of Naples is an expansive UNESCO World Heritage Site that boasts beautiful, varied architecture. Nearby places of interest include Naples Cathedral, Piazza del Plebiscito, Castel Nuovo, the Royal Palace of Naples and the Naples National Archaeological Museum, which showcases many artefacts from Pompeii. Universita metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Naples destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional Neapolitan mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are a minimum of 18sqm and decorated in a modern style with light wood furniture and carpeted floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
